232.customerMessage1: Yes, I received an item that I purchased from your store and it came completely damaged. I have proof of me opening the box and you can see that damage damaged.
232.AgentMessage1: Toynk: I'm sorry to hear that. Let me check on this with my team. Can you please send me a photo of the items that you received, along with your order number and email address?
232.customerMessage4: Where would I find the order number at?
232.customerMessage5: That's the wrong email address. I'm getting the email address right now.
232.AgentMessage2: Toynk: I completely understand. Did you place the order directly through our website? If so, you can find the order number in the confirmation we sent to your email. Please also check your spam or promo folders as sometimes emails end up there.
232.AgentMessage3: Toynk: Thanks for the info! I will pass this along to my team and get back to you as soon as possible, hang tight!
232.AgentMessage4: Toynk: While I wait to hear back from my team, is there anything else I can assist you with in the meantime?
232.customerMessage9: No I'm just really upset about how my doll came
232.AgentMessage5: Toynk: I completely understand your concern, and I'm sorry for any inconvenience. Rest assured that our team is doing everything to respond to each inquiry in a timely manner. They should follow up with your concern in no time. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
232.AgentMessage6:
Toynk: Thanks for your patience! I just heard from the team, and we understand how important this is. We are sorry to hear the item arrived damaged. If you would like to return your item for a refund please visit our website and scroll down to the bottom of the page and select "Return Policy". From there you will find information about our returns process, and you can initiate your return request for a prepaid return label.

https://toynk.attn.tv/a5S4PNpR-ZTn

If you would like to exchange the item, please email help@toynk.com

If you have any further questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact me. We're here to help!
232.customerMessage11: Do I get my money first or I have to send it then you guys send me the money
232.AgentMessage7: Toynk: You'll have to send the item back for us to process it and issue your refund. Hope this helps!
232.customerMessage12: I'm really not happy about this at all I spent a lot of money for something that came messed up
232.AgentMessage8: Toynk: Sorry to hear that! Feedback from our customers is really valuable and helps us constantly improve. I'll definitely pass this along to the team to consider in the future, and thank you for the feedback. If you have any questions, feel free to text me.
232.customerMessage14: The company is definitely not getting a good review for me and I will definitely not be buying anything else and I will not recommend anybody else buying anything from you guys
232.AgentMessage9: Toynk: I'm really sorry about this, and surely, this isn't the experience I want you to have. You may choose to receive a refund to your original form of payment or opt for store credit. Customers who choose store credit will receive an additional $5 bonus added to their refund amount. You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://toynk.attn.tv/a_tC6-j_fnWH Let me know if there's anything else I can help with!

My hair is straight I don't have any processed products at the salon anymore I used to get highlights. 
What weird that my hair wasn't 
White ish grey tilk this happened.

Roots and growing thicker strands of hair again.

235.customerMessage4: Oh I apologize I do see you received my first entire text
235.AgentMessage2:
Kerotin: Yes, I have! Thank you so much for sharing all of that. I understand your concern about the changes you've noticed and how unsettling it can feel to notice changes in your hair.

Based on what you described, I do recommend our Keratin Freshening Duo - https://kerotin.attn.tv/ahV2PJxHW6kp It is formulated to promote hair growth and help prevent hair loss. This line includes strengthening ingredients like Keratin and Biotin, along with growth supporting oils such as Rosemary Oil, which help nourish hair follicles, support the roots, and encourage stronger, fuller looking strands over time. The Dual Treatment line can help create a healthier scalp environment and support overall hair strength and growth.

I hope this helps, and please let me know if there's anything else I can assist with!
235.customerMessage7: Can I order through you? What would you recommend?
